alert.note: Alert for Chilton; Coosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 8:41PM CDT until August 11 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Chilton County in central Alabama... Southwestern Coosa County in east central Alabama... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 841 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marble Valley to near Thorsby, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clanton, Thorsby, Speed, Lyle, Pentonville, Mitchell Lake, Dollar, Gap Of The Mountain, Lay Lake Dam, Unity, Moriah, Higgins Ferry Park, Verbena, Lay Lake, Lomax, I 65 Rest Area, Mitchell Dam and Cooper. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
